title: The Demented: Contagion
description: Contagion â€“ Book 3 in The Demented Z SeriesThe thrilling conclusion to the unrelenting zombie series The Demented Z is here. Fevers run rampant. The infection spreads. Trust is at a minimum. Survivors must deal with undead, demented, and the possibility of the man next to them turning. Zombies and demented rule the earth.All hope may not be lost. A possible key to ending the nightmare is within grasp. Can anyone reach it in time? What will they have to sacrifice along the way?If you haven't read the previous books in the series, then now is the time. Book 1, The Demented, is on sale for the week.Book 1 - The DementedBook 2 - The DesolationBook 3 - The ContagionNovella 1 (Book 1.5) - The Confliction
author: Derek J. Thomas
